@id.description: The unique identifier of the Create Update Tombstone Event, this includes the version of the object

@type.description: The type of the object, in this case ods:CreateUpdateTombstoneEvent

dcterms:identifier.description: The unique identifier of the Create Update Tombstone Event, this includes the version of the object

prov:Activity.description: This class described the activity that was performed on the Digital Object, Based on the prov-ontology Activity Class

@id.description: The unique identifier of the Activity, this is a generated uuid (generated by the provenance service)

@type.description: The type of the activity that was performed on the object

prov:wasAssociatedWith.description: Contains a reference to zero or more prov:Agent objects that were associated with the Activity

@id.description: The unique identifier of the prov:Agent that was associated with the Activity

prov:hadRole.description: The role of the agent in the activity

prov:endedAtTime.description: The date and time when the activity ended. This is also the moment the CreateUpdateTombstone Event is created, following the ISO Date Time Format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX

prov:used.description: The unique identifier of the Digital Object that was the object of the Activity (as indicated at @id in the Activity Class)

examples: Digital Specimen was updated by user XXX at 2024-02-23T15:12:00.131Z
Annotation was created by user YYY at 2021-06-01T12:00:00.111Z

ods:changeValue.description: The json patch object that describes the changes made to the object as opposed to the previous version, empty if this is a ods:Create

prov:Entity.description: The Digital Object on which the Activity took place, the resulting Digital Object is stored as the `prov:value`

@id.description: The unique identifier of the Create Update Tombstone Event, this includes the version of the object

@type.description: The type of the ods type of the entity. This provides information about the structure of the `prov:value` field

prov:value.description: The full object that is the result of the prov:Activity, the structure of this object is defined by the `@type` field.

examples.schema:name: Default Mapping for Herbarium of University of Coimbra (COI)
examples.schema:description: The default mapping for the Herbarium of the University of Coimbra (COI) to the Darwin Core standard.

prov:wasRevisionOf.description: The unique identifier (handle) of the previous version of the object, only present when prov:Activity is of type ods:Update and ods:Tombstone

prov:wasGeneratedBy.description: The unique identifier of the prov:Activity that generated the Entity (as indicated at @id in the Activity Class), http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#wasGeneratedBy

ods:hasAgents.description: Contains zero or more prov:Agent objects, connected based on the identifier with the `prov:Activity`

items.description: Based on the prov-ontology Agent Class
